title: Broken Client
body: Hello there, yesterday i lost connection cuz somehow my WiFi sucks and when i tried to reconnect i couldn't it says i had to check the internet connection and try again.... I tried that like +4 times and it didn't work out... I repaired the client Still didn't get fixed.THEN!!! I re-installed the game but it STILL!!! Didn't get fixed... Can someone help me today

replies.body: Thanks dude it was the firewall i got it fixed

There might be something that's blocking your network from being able to reach our servers reliably. There's a decent chance that some of your settings just need to be updated, so let's be sure to check up on those [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) first. Test those changes in a custom game, and hit me back up if you still can't stay connected!
